app_description.message: Toggle JavaScript engines (inline, data URL, remote, and external) on and off the easy way

options_title.message: Options Page :: JavaScript Toggle On and Off

options_refresh_enabled.message: Reload the page when JavaScript is switched on

options_refresh_disabled.message: Reload the page when JavaScript is switched off

options_whitelist.message: (When JavaScript is blocked). A comma-separated list of domains where JavaScript is allowed despite the global block

options_blacklist.message: (When JavaScript is allowed). A comma-separated list of domains where JavaScript is blocked, even when it's allowed globally

options_badge_color.message: Badge icon color when JavaScript is disabled.

bg_warning.message: This extension works only with HTTP and HTTPS URLs.
